lead_paragraph: Two women were connected to Mr. Silver’s position as State Assembly speaker, according to newly unsealed papers from his federal corruption trial.

headline.print_headline: Unsealed Court Documents in Silver Case Cite Extramarital Affairs
headline.main: U.S. Cites Extramarital Affairs as Misuse of Power in Sheldon Silver Case

snippet: Two women were connected to Mr. Silver’s position as State Assembly speaker, according to newly unsealed papers from his federal corruption trial.
abstract: Unsealed court documents in corruption case against former New York State Assembly Speaker Sheldon Silver reveal he engaged in extramarital affairs with two unidentified women connected to his position in Legislature; prosecutors will use documents at Silver's sentencing to counter defense and show that Silver has used his influence to dispense preferential treatment for future favors.
